pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
pre_caption: This is a scenery shot of a classic street in Lisbon, Portugal. The camera remains stationary, capturing the view up a narrow, hilly road lined with historic buildings and tram tracks. The primary motion in the scene is a white and yellow tram passing by in the foreground.
